title: Venue: Samadhee Gampaha
text: Samadhee Institute is one of the Leading supplementary teaching provider in Gampaha district since 1989 with 100% state university graduated teachers. However, due to this COVID19 pandamic situation, our classes will be held using an online learning system. We will move to Samadhee Institute as soon as possible after this situation was restored. Thank you.
